# Media entity property keys

**API Collection**

The property keys used to retrieve metadata for media entities.

## Overview

You obtain metadata for a media entity by calling the [doc://com.apple.mediaplayer/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMediaEntity/value(forProperty:)] method with these property keys. You can also use some properties to build media property predicates, as described in [doc://com.apple.mediaplayer/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMediaPropertyPredicate]. These properties are filterable.

## Constants

- **MPMediaEntityPropertyPersistentID**: The persistent identifier for a media entity.
